name: Moira_Kruger
content:
Lady Moira Kruger settled on Chrona with the intention of raising banthas. However, the discovery of chronamite and the poisoning of her bantha herds changed her plans. As the town of Corestrike grew, Lady Kruger won the Grinder Dance Hall in a game of sabacc.
Kruger, alongside Mortris Gallorr and Arno Gallorr, were part of the Magistrate Council dealing with criminal trials in Corestrike. However, Kruger was also in a romantic relationship with the criminal Themog. As a result, her vote on the council was corrupted, allowing criminals to walk free.
